name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As an AI Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in leveraging **AI/ML** and **LLMs** to build innovative solutions for complex challenges in healthcare and finance. My technical skills include **Python**, **LangChain**, **Hugging Face Transformers**, and the **OpenAI API**, complemented by robust expertise in developing REST and GraphQL APIs with **FastAPI**. I excel in microservices architecture, enabling seamless integration of predictive analytics capabilities using **RAG pipelines** and **vector databases**. 

My experience encompasses extensive work in **Azure**, **AWS**, and **GCP**, ensuring scalable cloud solutions. I am proficient in containerization using **Docker** and orchestration with **Kubernetes** to streamline deployments. My commitment to data privacy and security is reflected in my adherence to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. 

In addition to my technical acumen, I have a solid foundation in documentation and communication, which allows me to effectively convey complex concepts and collaborate with cross-functional teams. I am passionate about advancing AI deployment strategies and implementing MLOps workflows that drive operational excellence.
